title: Instructional Design Simulation for Improving Accessibility and Inclusivity in Academic Libraries

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic library services and educational experience
context.additional_context: For pre-service/inservice language teachers, strengthening competencies to resolve accessibility challenges in digital environments.

learning_goals: Participants can identify at least three physical/digital accessibility barriers in an academic library within a VR simulation environment.
Participants can propose at least five considerations when applying AI/digital asset management systems for inclusive service design.
Participants can create an accessibility improvement action plan through a team project and conduct simulation testing in a VR environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
